bar_mod.comment: Bar length is intentionally displayed inaccurately to emphasise bonuses!

callback_with_context.context_function_id: GetIfElse(Value > ValueBase, MinNumericValue(ValuePercent + 0.1, 1), GetIfElse(Value < ValueBase, MinNumericValue(ValuePercentBase + 0.1, 1), ValuePercentBase))

name_icon_parent.comment: uses ResizeChildrenToFit callback to shrink stat_name (& thus font size) as the mod_icon list grows

label_context_name.comment: Fill in context object and function to match objects dealing with so can display object. Also feel free to add any other children such as icons want to display for each entry, etc

template_faction_entry.comment: Fill in context object type with what type need to store for diplay purposes and for passing along. Also feel free to change ContextCommandLeftClick to an initialiser or whatever else you want to handle when selecting an entry. Also feel free to add any other children such as icons want to display for each entry, etc

frame.comment: Fill in context object type with what type need to store for diplay purposes and for passing along. Also feel free to change ContextCommandLeftClick to an initialiser or whatever else you want to handle when selecting an entry. Also feel free to add any other children such as icons want to display for each entry, etc

panel_smoke_t.comment: Opacity set to 0 so that when material cant be shown (loading screens) it doesnt leave a blank white image around!

callback_with_context.context_function_id: #Try required as character context can be cleared#Try(CampaignRadarPosition(Position))

map_notification.componentleveltooltip: This character is currently visible on the map.
